org.jgrapes.portal.base.events

Class RenderPortlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>
        • org.jgrapes.portal.base.events.PortalCommand
          • org.jgrapes.portal.base.events.RenderPortlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<Void>, org.jgrapes.core.Associator, org.jgrapes.core.Eligible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPortlet.RenderPortletFromReader, FreeMarkerPortlet.RenderPortletFromTemplate

    public abstract class RenderPortlet
extends PortalCommand

    A base class for portal commands Sent to the portal page for adding or updating a complete portlet representation. This class maintains all required information except the actual content (the HTML) which must be provided by the derived classes.
